caption.center: STATE OF NORTH CAROLINA v. ALFONZO MEEKS.

opinion.opinion_text:
ORDER Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 8th of December 2009 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Wake County:
"Dismissed by order of the Court in Conference this the 28th of January 2010."Page 1
